channel.title: Need help making npcs!
channel.description: ok my server is running well, but i want a place just for attacking npc's like demons and such, and i chose Wildy north of verrock, But i dont understand what to code for it, I mean i no the Y and X coords. But i dont understand the rest.. like rangeX1 and all that...Can someone tell me where i get the code and such for it.

item.title: Need help making npcs!
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

you probly placed it before the
[ENDNPCLIST]
or whatever it says int eh brakcets…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making npcs!
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

like this:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 516 3251 3423 0 0 0 0 0 1 Barrows Seller

first is the npcID, remember to use TABS very important, if you don’t it won’t work. coord x and y is where the NPC is positioned. like haxor X said the height leave at 0 range x1 0 range y1 0 range x2 0 range y2 leave at 0 and the walk type at 1, im not sure waht the walk type does, i think 2 or 3 moves it around but you have to fill in Range X1 x2 y 1 y 2,

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making npcs!
item.dc:creator: @Revolution1 Revolution1
item.description:
@Revolution1 wrote:

Didnt Help, Ok i added this to autospawn.cfg. And I didnt get any errors, But it doesnt show up, I did coords to where north of verrock is, i even got in game, and checked

heres what i put

spawn = 50 3247 3532 1 0 0 0 0 0 King Black Dragon

Now, It doesnt show up

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making npcs!
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

if you want the npcs to move you fill in those…

if not just put 0 for those spots…

Read full topic
